Kevin Munc

Some Pics From an Old Vacation

24 Jan 2018

I grabbed these off my brother-in-law’s Facebook feed recently. They are from a trip that he, a friend, my wife and I took to Hong Kong, Bangkok and Chiang Mai back in 2001. It was a great trip—my 3rd and, sadly, most recent to Asia.

In a way, these pics, which are from the days well before I had a mobile phone, let alone one with a camera —now saved from a bloated iOS app, and posted using the beta of a cool iOS app— are having a new digital trip of sorts.
